mapper.insert: insert into hangout_info( hangoutcreator, hangoutname, hangoutcontent, hangoutarea, hangoutopendate, hangoutclosedate, hangoutdate, hangoutcategory) values( #{hangoutCreator}, #{hangoutName}, #{hangoutContent}, #{hangoutArea}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), #{hangoutCloseDate}, #{hangoutDate}, #{hangoutCategory} )
